tvdb: Jack runs into Anne-Marie, but she mysteriously disappears just as Livvie arrives.  Karen bravely stands up to an armed robber at the Recovery Room and cuts her hand, but Chris finds her hand perfectly healed.  After seeing Valerie cozy up to Jamal, Livvie suggests to Alison that Jamal fathered Valerie's baby.  After talking with Eve about Anne-Marie, a suspicious Kevin decides to go talk to Ian.  Lucy visits Ian's hotel room and tells him her fears Caleb's behind the recent chaos in town.  When Ian spills a drink on Lucy, she changes into a robe.  Kevin walks in to find Lucy and Ian in what looks to be a compromising position.
